mdRecord.dcterms:title: Recueil de receptes choisies experimentées & approuvées: Contre quantité de maux fort cōmuns tant internes q'uexternes inveterés, & difficiles à guerir
Recueil de receptes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Fouquet, Marie de Maupeou vicomtesse de Vaux, 1590-1681 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: [A]-B⁸ A2⁸ B-Y⁸ (leaf B8, 1st group, is blank. Special t.-p. for the 2nd part (not included in pagination) is bound as the 1st leaf of gathering T, but the signature mark "T" is printed on the following page.) [original]
Special title page for: Recueil de receptes. Seconde partie. [original]
Preface signed, in print: Delascure Docteur en medecine de l'Université de Montpeillè. [original]
Errors in pagination: nos. 121 and 199 omitted; no. 289 is followed by 4 unnumbered pages (the 1st and 3rd blank); pagination resumes with no. 290. [original]
Running title: Recueil de receptes or Recueil des receptes. [original]
Also published under title: Les remedes charitables de Madame Fouquet. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Bookplate of N. Yemeniz. With unsigned bibliographic and provenance notes written on front and back flyleafs. One brief note, "Je crois ces notes de Chardin. Ch. N." Ownership stamp, Collection Munaret. Other owner's names given in notes , Mr. De Selle, Tresorier General de la Marine, and Mr. Gersaint. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 241. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Bookplate of N. Yemeniz. With unsigned bibliographic and provenance notes written on front and back flyleafs. One brief note, "Je crois ces notes de Chardin. Ch. N." Ownership stamp, Collection Munaret. Other owner's names given in notes , Mr. De Selle, Tresorier General de la Marine, and Mr. Gersaint. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Therapeutics
Medicine--Formulae, receipts, prescriptions
